project_abstract.cdata: The project would assist in the development of middle level management and skill training for the modern sector. It would provide for: (i) strengthening of vocational and technical education; (ii) improved accounting training; (iii) a program for management training for educational personnel; (iv) greater access of women to technical education; (v) a study aimed at increasing the effectiveness of the Institute of Education; and (vi) an improved monitoring and evaluation system. The project faces no special risks. However, close supervision of interministerial coordination at the critical stages of design, tendering and procurement will be necessary to assure successful technical execution.
